titleStmt.title: VVine and women or A briefe description of the common courtesie of a curtezan. Written solely for the benefit of immodest and intemperate youth.
titleStmt.author: E. F. (Edward Ford), fl. 1630?-1660.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Dec: 3d 1646"; the 7 in the imprint date has been crossed out and replaced with "1646".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Thomason recieved his copy in December 1646.
